abstract: PhyloTree provides a comprehensive suite of algorithms for phylogenetic tree reconstruction and analysis, incorporating state-of-the-art statistical methods and computational optimizations. The software supports multiple sequence alignment formats, implements various evolutionary models, and offers both command-line and graphical user interfaces. Advanced features include parallel processing capabilities, bootstrap analysis, and integration with popular bioinformatics databases.
